Dear FIRSTNAME LASTNAME,

Keeping with IBM’s time-honored tradition of recognizing the contributions of IBMers whose behavior and results typify IBM at our best, you are invited to recognize the recent achievement of JOHN SMITH in IBM’s Service Recognition program for achieving 25 years of service.

In celebration JOHN SMITH will receive a personalized congratulatory web page—consisting of messages, photos and videos posted by colleagues,  family members and friends, including you! We invite you to commemorate this special achievement by contributing your own messages of congratulations, including appropriate photos and videos.

It’s quick, easy and fun to do.

Thank you in advance, your contribution will help ensure a personal and memorable recognition experience for JOHN SMITH.

Click here to get started.

IMPORTANT: Please make your contributions right away as access to the site will end on: 8/14/2016. You will have the opportunity to invite others to recognize JOHN SMITH on the web site. Please do not forward this email directly.

Thank you for your participation.

IBM RECOGNITION CENTER TEAM
